text: My Friend, Kolka! () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksei Saltykov and Aleksander Mitta.Синематека по-московски. Какие фильмы и где можно посмотреть в декабреДРУГ МОЙ, КОЛЬКА It stars Aleksandr Kobozev, Anna Rodionova, and Alexey Borzunov. ==Actors== *Aleksandr Kobozev - Kolka Snegiryov *Anna Rodionova - Masha Kanareikina *Alexey Borzunov - Yura Ustinov *Viktor Onuchak - Fedya Drankin *Tatyana Kuznetsova - Klava Ogorodnikova *Antonina Dmitriyeva - Ivanova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksei Saltykov
title: My Friend, Kolka!
